headline.main: LL Cool J to Host Grammys

docs.snippet: LL Cool J will host the Grammy Awards next month, marking the first time in seven years that the show's producers have decided to go with a single master of ceremonies....

keywords.value: National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations

docs.abstract: LL Cool J will host the Grammy Awards next month, marking the first time in seven years that the show's producers have decided to go with a single master of ceremonies.
docs.lead_paragraph: LL Cool J will host the Grammy Awards next month, marking the first time in seven years that the show's producers have decided to go with a single master of ceremonies, the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences announced on Wednesday. Since 2008, the rapper and actor has been the host for the televised nominations concert the Grammys produces in the fall. This is the first time, however, he will be asked to keep the main ceremony moving along.
